BSI.MOBILE_AVATAR_STATUS_MODAL_BODY: Changing the mobile avatar status setting will re-launch Discord. Are you sure you want to do this?
BSI.HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DISABLED_MSG: Hi, there! We've noticed that you've disabled hardware acceleration. "Better Status Indicators" recommends leaving this feature on for significantly better results â€” visually and quantitatively.
BSI.STATUS_DISPLAY_DEFAULT_OPT: Default: Modern, beautiful, and easy on your eyes.
BSI.STATUS_DISPLAY_CLASSIC_OPT: Classic: Tried and true color-blind mode.
BSI.TRUE_STATUS_DESC: Displays all statuses with their true color when a user is performing an activity.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_MEMBERS_LIST_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in the members list.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_USER_POPOUT_MODAL_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in the user popout / profile modal.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_DM_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator under direct messages.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_MATCH_COLOR_DESC: Fills the {client} status indicator with the corresponding color of their status.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_AVATAR_STATUS_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator within the avatar. If disabled, the mobile indicator will be displayed next to usernames.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_SHOW_ON_SELF_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator for yourself; requires the {client} "Preserve Status" setting to be enabled.
BSI.CLIENT_SWITCH_SHOW_ON_BOTS_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator for bot users.
BSI.DESKTOP_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the desktop status indicator even if the user is active on web or mobile.
BSI.MOBILE_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the mobile status indicator even if the user is active on desktop.
BSI.WEB_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the web status indicator even if the user is active on desktop or mobile.
